Remove Tattoos: Remove all tattoos from the primary subject in the image. Maintain the same fidelity, pose, composition, lighting, and color.
Enhance Details: Enhance the fine details and textures throughout the image while preserving the original composition, lighting, and color balance.
Fix Hands: Correct any anatomical issues with hands and fingers in the image. Ensure natural proportions, proper finger count, and realistic positioning while maintaining the original style.
